title: Was the name of a child after Robert Matthews, Savior 9/11?
subtitle: A supposed novel by a woman who said that she named her child after the savior who died while she and the others were saving her at the World Trade Center on 11 September.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A woman named her child after the savior who died while she and the others were rescued at the World Trade Center on September 11th.
